name: One Strange Day
description:
One Strange day: First Version By: Austin Sevigny 

Group Members: Austin, Brennem, Anthony

A lonely house in the woods has one strange day where evil space tanks burst through the doors and attack your house. You must defend yourself with homemade, automated turrets, you can set up around your living room.

The game takes place in the middle of nowhere at an unknown time.

Additional Features: include Increasing difficulty over time.

Pending features - Score Tracking, Health Tracking, Different Turrets, and Tanks.
